amount_of_solvents.CHCl3: 12 mL for washing, 12 mL for soaking

synthesis_conditions.equipment: scintillation vials, programmable oven, sand bath
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2·4H2O (6.00 g, 22.9 mmol), 2-aminobenzenedicarboxylic acid (1.50 g, 8.30 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with dry DMF (3 × 12 mL) followed by one rinse with 12 mL of CHCl3, then soaked in CHCl3 for 3 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 75 °C under vacuum for 12 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: alkyl anhydride (2 equiv, 0.20 mmol for n = 1 to 15; 0.8 equiv, 0.08 mmol for n = 18)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with CH2Cl2 (3 × 2 mL) and soaked in CH2Cl2 for 3 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 90 °C under vacuum for 8 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: alkyl anhydride (2 equiv, 0.4 mmol for n = 1 to 15; 0.8 equiv, 0.16 mmol for n = 18)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with CHCl3 (3 × 5 mL) before soaking in 5 mL of pure CHCl3 for 3 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: stored in the last CHCl3 solution until needed
